div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%
div.p: Profiles: Extractable Questionnaire - StructureMap, Advanced Behavior Questionnaire, CRMI Shareable StructureDefinition, CRMI Publishable StructureDefinition

table.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

tr.style: border: 1px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top

vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: #F7F7F7; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px

tr.td: Due date of next dose

a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: Data elements for the IMMZ.D13.Update client record Data Dictionary Activity.

name.value: Mapping from the IMMZ.D13 to the IMMZObservation profile
Mapping from the IMMZ.D13 to the IMMZImmunization profile

definition.value: Data elements for the IMMZ.D13.Update client record Data Dictionary Activity.
The patient.
Indicates if the client received a dose within 24 hours of birth. Whether a birth dose is counted as part of the primary series will depend on the antigen

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE19 vaccine type is Hepatitis B-containing vaccines OR Poliovirus-containing vaccines.

definition.value: The type of dose in a series that the client received

Indicates if the client has completed the primary vaccination series of a product/antigen. If the client has not yet completed their primary series, it means they may be expected to receive more doses to complete their vaccination regimen for the respective product/antigen
Indicates if the client has completed the booster series of a product/antigen

short.value: Date when primary vaccination series was completed

definition.value: The date when the client completed the primary vaccination series (per product/antigen)

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE203 Completed the primary vaccination series is Yes
Date ≤ current date

definition.value: The current HIV status of the client
The type of the poliovirus vaccine dose administered to the client

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE19 vaccine type is BCG vaccines OR Hepatitis B-containing vaccines

definition.value: The type of Japanese encephalitis (JE) vaccine dose administered to the client

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE19 vaccine type is JE vaccines

definition.value: The type of tick-borne encephalitis (TBE) vaccine dose administered

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE19 vaccine type is TBE vaccines

definition.value: The type of typhoid vaccine dose administered to the client

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE19 vaccine type is Typhoid vaccines

definition.value: The type of cholera vaccine dose administered to the client

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE19 vaccine type is Cholera vaccines

definition.value: The type of meningococcal vaccine dose administered to the client

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE19 vaccine type is Meningococcal vaccines

definition.value: The type of hepatitis A-containing vaccine dose administered to the client

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE19 vaccine type is Hepatitis A-containing vaccines

definition.value: The type of hepatitis B-containing vaccine dose administered to the client

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE6 vaccine type is Hepatitis B-containing vaccines

display.value: Vaccine code (CPT [Current Procedural Terminology]) CPHS (Children's Preventative Health System)

definition.value: Vaccine type/category that was administered or was to be administered. Any vaccine code available in the IMMZ.Z Vaccine library list of codes applies in this data element
Represents the visit/encounter date, which is the date and time when each vaccine was administered to the client
The date and time of the client's contact

human.value: DateTime ≤ current DateTime

display.value: Number of visits to this health-care entity in the last 12 months
Total number of prenatal care visits

definition.value: The antenatal care (ANC) contact or visit number
Vaccine dose number including dose number within series

human.value: Must be positive decimal value greater than or equal to zero (≥0)

definition.value: The current status of the individual immunization event
The reason this immunization event was not performed

human.value: Required if input in IMMZ.D.DE1 Immunization event status is Not Done

definition.value: The brand or trade name used to refer to the vaccine received
Uses a living but weakened version of the virus or one that is very similar
The service delivery country where the vaccine administration occurred
The service delivery location (location name, city, municipality, town or village) where the vaccine administration occurred
The manufacturer of the vaccine product
Batch number or lot number of vaccine
Name of the market authorization holder of the vaccine received. If market authorization holder is unknown, vaccine manufacturer is REQUIRED

display.value: Expiration date of medication (Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality [AHRQ])

definition.value: The expiration date of the vaccine

display.value: Doses of vaccine given per symptom onset

definition.value: The quantity of vaccine product that was administered

human.value: Must be positive decimal value greater than zero (>0.00)

definition.value: The person, organization or role of the entity that performed the act of giving the vaccine to the client. The implementing system can choose to populate this field using data from a health worker registry or health-care facility registry
The recommended number of doses for immunity according to the national immunization schedule (which may be based on product, age, etc.)

human.value: Must be positive decimal value greater than zero (>0.00)

definition.value: Vaccine-preventable disease being targeted
Date on which the next vaccination should be administered, if a next dose is required
